text: "When we hear about (terror attacks in) London or Paris, Stockholm and now Barcelona, you could almost start to become numb to it, like this is something becoming normal and we don't need to talk about it here on our show," Corden said. "But we think we mustn't allow it to become something that's normal. We must talk about it so that we remember how sad, horrific and tragic these moments are.
title: James Corden on Barcelona: We can't let terror attacks become accepted as 'normal'

meta_data.description: The late-night host also honored the victims of Thursday's horrific act of terror.
